title: LeaveBuster
body:
Hi riot. 
Im just curious about my leave buster. I was surprise that i have 1. i didn't leave a game yesterday. 
So, I'm wondering why did i get a leave buster. Hopefully you guys can help me with this. 
Thank you so much riot for helping me always. 
Have a great week.

replies.body: Hmmmmmm it seems like you might have had some connection issues over the past couple days since your match history is showing a few AFK games even though you never intentionally left any games. I want to make sure you get the main issue sorted out, so let's run through and update a few of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure you're able to stay in those matches. Make sure to test those changes in the practice tool, and let me know if it helps!
